    public static class Chat.ChatJson
extends java.lang.Object
    Static class for our Json Please see the getJsonJoin for documentation, on how messages are constructed

      • getJsonPut

        public static java.lang.String getJsonPut(java.lang.String aliasSender,
                                          java.lang.String aliasReceiver,
                                          java.lang.String message)
        Function to return a filled schema of the PUT JSON request. Used for sending messages to another user
        Parameters:
        aliasSender - - the alias of the sender of the message
        aliasReceiver - - the alias of the receiver for the message
        message - - the message the receiver will view
        Returns:
        Json Object as a string to be sent in the ObjectOutputStream
